name: ApplicantStack Applicant Tracking Software
overview:
Affordable and easy-to-use Applicant Tracking and eRecruitment software specifically designed for small to mid-size businesses.

For years large corporations have used Applicant Tracking Software (ATS) to electronically track all job applicants and build an applicant database. Until recently Applicant Tracking Software has been a luxury for corporations with large HR budgets, as traditional systems are expensive, complex and bloated with functions most businesses just donâ€™t need. With ApplicantStack Applicant Tracking Software, applicant tracking is finally available to small and mid-size businesses with easy-to-use functionality and affordable pricing.

Employees are the lifeblood of an organization, and hiring the right employees at the right time is critical to a companyâ€™s success. To hire the best, your recruiters and hiring managers need to be equipped with tools that will allow them to quickly source qualified candidates and manage them through the hiring process. ApplicantStack hiring software gives you powerful yet easy-to-use tools that will help you implement your online hiring process and find the best employees more quickly.

Still collecting paper applications or resumes via email? With ApplicantStack hiring software you can implement a more streamlined hiring process.
